select
from jm_project
sub_category_id=#{subCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
title like concat('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND
invest_code=#{amountCode}
order by invest_min ASC
order by invest_max DESC

select count(1) from jm_project
sub_category_id=#{subCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
title like concat('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND
invest_code=#{amountCode}
select id,created_at createAt,updated_at updateAt,creator,modifier,title,spell,icon,delete_flag deleteFlag from jm_category where delete_flag =0 order by id asc

select
from jm_project where state=1 and attribute=0 order by id LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from jm_project where state=1 and attribute=0

select
from jm_project where id=#{projectId}
select id,created_at,updated_at,creator,modifier,project_id,apply_count,visit_count,join_store_count,direct_store_count,delete_flag from jm_project_stat where project_id=#{projectId}

select id, category_id, title, spell, icon, hot_flag, recommend_flag,index_flag,created_at,updated_at,creator,modifier,delete_flag from jm_sub_category
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
spell = #{spell,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
hot_flag = #{hotFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND
recommend_flag = #{recommendFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND
index_flag = #{indexFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND
creator=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
modifier=#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
created_at=#{createAt,jdbcType=DATE} AND
updated_at=#{updateAt,jdbcType=DATE} AND
delete_flag=#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND
index_flag = 1

from jm_project
keyword like "%"#{keyword}"%" AND

select count(*) from jm_project
keyword like "%"#{keyword}"%" AND

select
from jm_project where state=1 and attribute=1 order by created_at desc LIMIT 10

from jm_project where state=1 and attribute=0 order by created_at desc LIMIT 10

select p.id,p.created_at as createAt,p.updated_at as updateAt,p.creator,p.modifier,direct_store as directStore, join_store as joinStore,message_num messageNum,category_id categoryId,sub_category_id subCategoryId,company_id companyId, title,keyword,photo,recommend_flag recommendFlag,register_time registerTime, company_name companyName,build_date buildDate,origin_addr originAddr,business_model businessModel,product,crowd, area,support,invest_min investMin,invest_max investMax,margin,facility_cost facilityCost,other_cost otherCost,description, state,attribute,p.delete_flag deleteFlag,core,invest_code investCode,invest_value investValue,region_id regionId,apply_count,visit_count from jm_project p INNER JOIN jm_project_stat s on p.id=s.project_id ORDER BY s.visit_count DESC LIMIT 0,10;
